testsuite.name: User Service Tests

testcase.name: Should fail getting user with zero ID

Should add role to user
Should fail registration with empty email
Should fail add role to non-existent user
Should get current user successfully
Should fail getting current user with invalid ID
Should fail hasRole with invalid user ID
Should fail getting user by non-existent username
Should register user successfully

Should update user profile
Should fail registration with duplicate email
Should return false when user does not have role
Should check user has role
Should fail update profile with invalid user ID
Should fail update profile with duplicate email
Should get user by username
Should fail registration with short password
Should delete user
Should fail getting user by empty username
Should get user by ID
Should fail registration with empty username
Should fail delete non-existent user
Should fail getting user with invalid ID
Should fail add role with invalid user ID
Should fail delete user with invalid ID
